AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a Full Front-end Developer, my main responsibility is to improve user experiences,With a solid foundation in Angular, NodeJs, React-Native, NestJs and Sass (which I have been improving since 2019), I am well prepared to face any development challenge.
In my history, I have professional experience in creating hibrid applications such as 'Porteiros no Comando' and 'Imoveistock', which gained prominence in the real estate market.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: MidLevel Software developer
Description: I used Angular to create the property sales and rental platform, as well as to develop an internal backoffice system for employee use.
I integrated time into the development of the 'Imoveistock' app and 'doormen in charge' in react-native Using MySQL on AWS and NestJS on Firebase

Experience.Jobs.Title: MidLevel Frontend Developer
Description: I worked as a Full Front-End Developer, leading projects such as e-commerce websites and Apps in Angular, React-Native and NestJS.

In time, we adopted Bundle Analyzer and unit tested with Jest to prioritize efficient resource loading performance, as well as Redux for React navigation states and Styled Components for a more cohesive and modular approach.

Orchestrated schema changes through migrations in MongoDB, for transitions between database versions with versioning using NestJS, used modules and dependency injection framework to create a scalable and modular architecture using swagger for better handling of HTTPS methods.

Database version changes were managed through migrations in the context of NestJS, allowing for incremental and controlled schema updates. This approach ensured efficient maintenance of the MongoDB database, adapting to the evolving needs of the system.
I employed the use of Storybook, to ensure visual consistency, I also ensured accessibility with the use of tools like Axe, resulting in better, high-quality products.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Junior React Developer
Description: I participated in the development of e-commerce websites using React.
I implemented Server-Side Rendering to improve performance, taking advantage of React Hooks and Redux for better navigation management.
In styling, I adopted Styled Components, and optimized performance with Code Splitting and lazy loading of images.
The use of Webpack and Babel were crucial to guarantee an optimized bundle in tests and debugs.
